publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2777.1 Jim Hume: Non-Native Invasive Species—As an amendment to motion (S3M-2777) in the name of Richard Lochhead, insert at end "recognises that prevention and early intervention are vital in protecting native species, habitats and ecosystems, and therefore calls on the Scottish Government to work with local organisations with a remit for the protection of Scotland’s natural environment to find ways to expedite the timeous implementation of measures at a local level and to report back to the Parliament with the findings."
